properties.name: spring.application.strategy.control.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy control is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.zone.avoidance.rule.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy zone avoidance rul is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.hystrix.threadlocal.supported
properties.description: Whether strategy hystrix threadlocal supported is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.register.isolation.group.blacklist
properties.description: Strategy register isolation group blacklist.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.register.isolation.group.whitelist
properties.description: Strategy register isolation group whitelist.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.register.isolation.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy register isolation is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.consumer.isolation.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy consumer isolation is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.provider.isolation.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy provider isolation is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.version.failover.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy version failover is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.version.prefer.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy version prefer is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.monitor.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy monitor is enabled. If disabled, tracer and logger are all disabled

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.logger.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy logger is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.logger.mdc.key.shown
properties.description: Whether strategy logger mdc key is shown.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.logger.debug.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy logger debug is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.tracer.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy tracer is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.tracer.separate.span.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy tracer separate span is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.tracer.rule.output.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy tracer rule output is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.tracer.exception.detail.output.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy tracer exception detail output is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.tracer.method.context.output.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy tracer method context output is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.tracer.span.value
properties.description: Strategy tracer span group value.

properties.name: spring.application.strategy.tracer.span.tag.plugin.value
properties.description: Strategy tracer span group tag plugin value.
